Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hillborough Way, just west of the Necropolis Avenue crossing.
Room.LongDescription: On both sides of the street, you can see a large shopping complex with all sorts of armors, weapons, gems and jewelry for sale. There's even a small pub in the northern complex, which looks kind of rowdy. To the east, you can see the intersection with Necropolis Avenue.
